    • Uses of FormattedMessage in org.simplity.http

      Fields in org.simplity.http declared as FormattedMessage 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.DATA_ERROR
      message to be sent to client if data text was not in order.
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.INTERNAL_ERROR
      message to be sent to client if there is any internal error
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.LOGIN_FAILED
      message to be used when client's request for login has failed
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.NO_LOGIN
      message to be sent to client if this request requires a login and the user has not logged in
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.NO_RESPONSE
      response is not yet available for this token
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.NO_SERVICE
      message to be used when client has not specified a service
      static FormattedMessage HttpAgent.NO_TOKEN
      no token from client
